name: Lottery Results Guide
overview:
Lottery Results Guide provides information on International Lottery Results, Draw Schedules, Prize Breakdowns, Jackpots, Advice, Lucky Number picker, Lottery News, Lottery Directory, Lottery Ticket Scams & Rip-offs. Where to play the Lottery online in safety, Lottery Forums, Lottery Blog, Seal of Approval Award for Lottery Ticket vendors, Participation in the Mega Millions draw every week free.

The main benefit to the site user is the excellent, How to Play Guide. You can also receive Worldwide Lottery Results from all the major lotteries by email. The membership share any winnings the site happens to accrue from a FREE Mega Millions Lottery Ticket purchased each week. Membership is free! Lotteries serviced: Australian Lotto, Canada 649, Euro Millions, Irish Lottery, Italian Superenalotto, UK National, Mega Millions, USA Powerball, Canada and more.
